subject: Officiating (Sports)
Rhythmic Gymnastics
Cheating
Olympic Games (2016)
Gymnastics
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: A scandal surrounding the Olympic sport of rhythmic gymnastics has implicated as many as 60 experts of the sport who were looking to qualify as official judges.
snippet: A scandal surrounding the Olympic sport of rhythmic gymnastics has implicated as many as 60 experts of the sport who were looking to qualify as official judges.
